content:
/>
X.ii.2.A.3.a
.
Considerations Relevant to Previously Decided Claims
On and after February 19, 2019, when deciding an effective date for a previously decided claim, decision makers must consider whether the underlying issue is
being continuously pursued under
38 CFR 3.2500(c)
, as discussed in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 2.A.3.b
, or
the subject of a supplemental claim filed after the prior claim has become finally adjudicated, as discussed in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 2.A.3.c
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Revision Based on Specific Types of Submissions, Including Supplemental Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
